column4: I installed my ati x700 using the lastest drivers from the ati page, everything is running smoothly, but every time in the program menu I start ati control it doesn't run and gives me a "child process fireglcontrolpanel" error, any thoughts?
thanks dystopianray for your help with the network manager
linux mint? isn't that the linux based off ubuntu that has everything ready out of the box?
yeah, i thought it was based off reconstructor.
